## Execute class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Execute class used for executing CLI interactions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Execute 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [emit(value)](./common.execute.emit.md) | <code>static</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Emit a string value to CLI. |
|  [run(command)](./common.execute.run.md) | <code>static</code> | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Run the provided command in a child process. |
